attributes.action: All UK Slaughter Houses to be totally Neutral
attributes.additional_details:
We the Undersigned call for all UK Slaughter houses to be neutral of race and religion.
Taking Into account the cruelty Inflicted on non stun livestock.
We are a predominantly Christian and Catholic country and there Is no place In Western society for any produce supplied to the masses such as the food chain, to be blessed In the name of any religion as the animal bleeds out.
Religion Is a deeply personal Issue and one religion should not be forced upon another.
We expect the Muslim prayer to be removed from all Halal slaughter houses and for Halal meat to be clearly labeled.

As Christians, we strongly object to our meat being blessed In the name of Allah, the Prophet responsible for so many atrocities around the world today and a Prophet that accepts no other Idols.
This Is pandering to a minority religion In our country while completely disrespecting the majority and other ethnic minorities
